mapper.insert:
select anonymous_seq.nextval from dual
insert into anonymous(ano,atitle,apassword,awriter,acontents) values(#{ano},#{atitle},#{apassword},#{awriter},#{acontents})
mapper.select: select apassword from anonymous where ano=#{ano}
mapper.update: update anonymous set atitle=#{atitle}, acontents=#{acontents}, aupdatedate=sysdate where ano=#{ano}
